page.title: 17THE FACTORY
page.content: The front of the factory looks like a small house but inside it is massive.It has been a family business since 1890 to 1973.It was commission weaving but now it is hosiery.They chose to have the factory in {BULKINGTON }because very good weavers lived there. Now they sell medical tights which are very thick but they also sell thinner ones. The prices are from Â£2.00 to Â£15.00.On the old machines it takes 12 minutes to weave a pair of tights,on the new machines it takes only 2 minutes.The dye smelt horrible,it takes 3 hours to dye the tights. Altogether they have 29 days holiday.They have only one week at Christmas, Easter and spring break and two weeks for the summer.
